Package es.gencom.mpegg.io

Class Payload

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.gencom.mpegg.io.Payload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BitReader, BitWriter, MPEGReader, MPEGWriter, Flushable
    public class Payload
extends Object
implements MPEGReader, MPEGWriter

    MPEG-G Payload based on an array of byte buffers.

    Author:
    , Dmitry Repchevsky & Daniel Naro

        public long getPosition()
        Description copied from interface: MPEGReader
        Returns position in the MPEGReader. Returns the position in number of bytes since the initial position. If not byte aligned, the position corresponds to the next aligned position.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
